SELECT sl.id AS id, sl.start_no AS startNo, p.nick AS playerNick, sl.commodity AS commodity, sl.consume AS consume, sl.award_lv AS awardLv, cl.lv_name AS awardName, sl.commodity_name AS commodityName, sl.warehouse_out AS warehouseOut, wo.out_no AS warehouseOutNo, sl.create_time AS createTime FROM silver_log sl LEFT JOIN player p ON sl.start_no = p.start_no LEFT JOIN commodity_lv cl ON sl.award_lv = cl.lv LEFT JOIN warehouse_out wo ON sl.warehouse_out IS NOT NULL AND sl.warehouse_out = wo.id
1=1
and sl.start_no like concat(concat('%',#{startNo}),'%')
GROUP BY sl.id
